name: Novant Health New Hanover Regional Medical Center LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Novant Health New Hanover Regional Medical Center LLC is a Psychiatric Unit provider based in Wilmington, NC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $57.5M in Medicaid payments across 865K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $57.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
